channel.title: DragonNest
channel.description:
http://dragonnest.nexon.net/
anybody else play this? Me and Kieran are going to start playing this together. We would love to get some other active users.

item.title: DragonNest
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

bumping this up cause this is an awesome game. Go tot level 15 yesterday. Aetoc, Kieran, and I have all been leveling together it’s pretty fun in groups real dull if you aren’t in a group. Contact info to get added to group: Skype: eddieconnerrsps

Read full topic

item.title: DragonNest
item.dc:creator: @Aetoc Aetoc
item.description:
@Aetoc wrote:

[quote=“Loveandpower, post:3, topic:529380”][quote author=Aetoc link=topic=648136.msg4359743#msg4359743 date=1378460810]
I just signed up earlier. Haven’t got a chance to play though. I’ll hop on with you guys if you want.
[/quote]add my skype : eddieconnerrsps

we plan to start around 6pmish hopefully. See you then. My account name is “Loveandpower”

I am fairly new to games in general besides RS so still getting used to wasd etc.[/quote]

I’m having to get used to it also honestly, haha.

Read full topic
